**Example 1: CreateProject**



Input: 

```
tccli solar CreateProject --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProjectBudget 1000 \
    --ProjectIntroduction Demo \
    --ProjectName Demo \
    --ProjectOrg 质量部 \
    --ProjectOrgId 652462622289039360
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "ProjectId": "testprj-b45zw7v5qk",
        "RequestId": "2cbf6e1c-10b7-40aa-9d4e-9328ed7def36"
    }
}
```
